mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_id, board_type, author_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{boardType}, #{authorId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_type = #{boardType}, author_id = #{authorId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT board_id, board_type, author_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at FROM board ORDER BY board_id DESC
